pr_title: Make inclusion of tenant ID configurable

timeline.message:
Encapsulate creation of command topic

The topic name to use for publishing a command to a device is now
encapsulated within the CommandSubscription where all relevant
information is available.

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

[#2363] Support inclusion of tenant ID in command topic

The MQTT adapter now allows clients to indicate whether they want the
target device's tenant and/or device IDs to be included in the topic
used when publishing commands.

This can be helpful for implementing (multi-tenant) protocol gateways
which can then determine a device's tenant and/or device ID from the
topic name.

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>
